name: COLOR WARRIOR
description:
Disclaimer: This is an entry for WOWIE GAMEJAM with the topic of Everything Interact With Everything.

Top Down Shooting with mannnny color, acts quick or you will die.

=======================================================

RULES: (Please Read)

  • WASD - For moving.
  • LEFT AND RIGHT CLICK - For shooting weapons.
  • AMMO IS YOUR HEALTH!!!
  • Pick Up Rainbow Color Ball For Health.
  • AND.....HAVE FUN!!!

=======================================================
